author: Cara Lombardo
title: Starboard Pursuing Proxy Fight at Newell Brands Despite Deal With Icahn
text:
Activist hedge fund Starboard Value LP isn’t dropping its proxy fight at Newell Brands Inc. after the maker of Elmer’s Glue and Graco baby strollers struck a deal with another activist, Carl Icahn.
Starboard, which owns a 3.8% stake in Newell, said in a Wednesday filing that the agreement with Mr. Icahn isn’t sufficient to fix the company’s issues. Newell agreed to let Mr. Icahn nominate five of 11 directors and promised to explore selling more of its businesses. Mr. Icahn holds a 6.9% stake in Newell.
